outputs.output_descr: CIDA' Contribution is part of the co-financing for the overall budget for the LDC and SIDS Targeted Portfolio Approach for Capacity Development and Manistreaming for Sustainable Land Management project.  CIDA's contribution will be of C$450,000 over three years (c$150,000 per year).  It will target "technical assistance for capacity building" and/or "knowledge management and networking.

project_descr: LDC and SIDS Targeted Portfolio Approach for Capacity Development and  mainstreaming of Sustainable Land Management
project_title: LDC and SIDS Targeted Portfolio Approach
